Comments_List: I got some training in solving problems in analysis, and had more experience using certain skills for analysis.
The problem set is very good, as we get a lot of problems to work on each week. It would be nice if the psets were graded sooner, though Professor Wolf has tried his best.
This should be good preparation for students interested in math/ probability.
